author: Trott
message:
doc: fix text for DEP0085

Fix a typographical error in deprecation text. Convert run-on sentence
to two sentences (one in parentheses).

PR-URL: https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/20519
Reviewed-By: Vse Mozhet Byt <vsemozhetbyt@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Refael Ackermann <refack@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Luigi Pinca <luigipinca@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Ruben Bridgewater <ruben@bridgewater.de>
Reviewed-By: James M Snell <jasnell@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Trivikram Kamat <trivikr.dev@gmail.com>

files.patch: @@ -798,8 +798,8 @@ code modification is necessary if that is done. Type: End-of-Life -The AsyncHooks Sensitive API was never documented and had various of minor -issues, see https://github.com/nodejs/node/issues/15572. Use the `AsyncResource` +The AsyncHooks Sensitive API was never documented and had various minor issues. +(See https://github.com/nodejs/node/issues/15572.) Use the `AsyncResource` API instead.
